about_the_game:
"Cat Gladiator" is a 2D co-op action game.

A middle-aged cat hunter who has lost his job finds himself taking on the role of a gladiator to make ends meet.

Grab your weapon and join forces with your cat companions to battle the formidable bosses in the arena!

Fight With Friends

Facing enemies alone proving too tough? Rally your friends and take on the challenge together! The game supports up to 4 players in cooperative multiplayer, allowing you to enjoy the thrill of grinding your foes into the dust!

Challenging Combat

The enemies in the arena are not to be underestimated! To emerge victorious, players must keenly observe and memorize their attack patterns, utilizing their weapon's unique traits to counter effectively. Of course, the enhancements from equipment and the strategic use of items are also crucial to success.

Diverse Weapon Styles

Currently, the game features five distinct weapons, with more to be added in the future:

Sword and Shield: Versatile and balanced, offering both offense and defense.

Long-sword: Elegant and agile, allowing players to dodge enemy attacks with precise timing and counter with swift strikes.

Small Cannon: A ranged weapon that alternates between sustained fire and charged attacks, enabling quick counterattacks after a dodge.

Greatsword: Delivers devastating single blows after a charge-up.

Dual Blades: Featuring rapid dodges and high-speed combos, players can unleash a whirlwind of slashes.

Each weapon has its own combat rhythm and special moves, providing players with a completely different combat experience as they battle their foes.

Rich and Varied Props

Traps, bombs, healing potions, secret-recipe grilled fish, and more. Clever use of props can significantly reduce the difficulty of combat!

Equipment with Various Functions

Using materials dropped by enemies, players can craft equipment with different appearances and functions. Whether it's boosting attack, defense, critical hit rate, or reducing the cooldown and speeding up the activation of items, the combinations of equipment functions are waiting for players to explore.
